subject: Feedback and information request regarding “SQ Pro Racing” component
description_text:
Subject: Feedback and information request regarding “SQ Pro Racing” component

Hello,
my name is Federico Bologni and I am the owner of the simulation center ETABETARACE ASD. We have been using your products for about six months and we are very satisfied with the “Simson Plus X” pedal sets — we currently have six of them. We also purchased an “HB Pro Racing” handbrake, which has performed very well.

Recently, we bought an “SQ Pro Racing” sequential shifter, which unfortunately broke after just a few days of use. We decided to open it — fully aware that this would void the warranty — in order to understand the cause of the issue, and we found that the internal tension spring had snapped.

I am attaching some photos of the damaged part so you can check whether this was an isolated incident or a potential weak point of the product.

I am writing because we have great trust in your brand, especially considering the excellent price‑to‑quality ratio, and we would be glad to contribute to your growth by providing useful feedback based on our daily experience in the sim racing sector.

Thank you for your attention.
Kind regards,




Federico Bologni

conversations.body_text: Hi Info, We can send you a new spring set for replacement. The previous batch had an incorrect bending angle, which made the spring more likely to fail. We have already improved the design and produced an updated batch of springs. We have also removed the older handbrake version from sale and are currently optimizing the internal structure further. Please provide your order number and the recipient name, phone number, and shipping address, so we can arrange the replacement shipment as soon as possible.
